# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Lawyer [italic]This job is primarily for roleplay and not considered as important as other roles.[/italic]
The Lawyer is responsible for representing the crew in legal matters. They can achieve this by representing the crew in court, or providing legal advice to the crew.
## Do - Know Space Law, better than the Warden if you can. - Represent the crew when they need legal advice. - Try to get your client off the hook!
## Don't - Act like an Admin; (mis)interpretation of Space Law is part of the fun. If you think a Warden/Security is objectively wrong with their ruling (such as ordering an execution), use ahelp.
